Articles.Content:
i have embarked on the hunt for Elon kerman. I have been at it for 3 hours and have killed 800 kerbals but still haven't found him. IS there a mod that automatically hires kerbals then puts them in a ship?. Ive seen Billy-Bobsen Kerman 3 times after I've killed him.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-10T18:36:50Z" title="06/10/2015 06:36  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 10, 2015</time> by DarthVader**
who is this Elon, and why are you hunting him?

There's no telling if the random name generator can produce an Elon.

You can always just go into the persistent.sfs and rename one of your Kerbals to be Elon.

> 
> who is this Elon, and why are you hunting him?

He's vaguely related to General Failure. As in: Ã¢â‚¬Å“*Who is General Failure, and why is he reading my disk*Ã¢â‚¬Â\*

\* the young ones here might not get that one.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> There's no telling if the random name generator can produce an Elon.
> You can always just go into the persistent.sfs and rename one of your Kerbals to be Elon.

I'm pretty sure he's either on my roster or I had him as a tourist, so yes, the generator **can** produce an Elon.

I have Elon. He is the only Kerbal I actually hired and the first non-orange-suited one I got. The rest of my roster is rescues. I saw him listed the first time I went into the Astronaut Complex and couldn't help myself. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

From 1.0 changelog: 

> 
> - Ã¢â‚¬ËœElon KermanÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ added to name pool.

He's in there somewhere. I haven't seen him myself though.
hmmmm, at one with the darkside, OP is.
Why not open the persistent file with your favorite text editor and change ALL of the names to Elon?
He was the first new crew member I rescued for money from a contract. Didn't know he was this rare! I must be pretty lucky then!
Elon must be busy over at Tesla Racing Simulator.
